name: test_e2e_with_logs[644_ENC_PATH_DBL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `ENC_PATH_DBL_001` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded path traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | double_encoded |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../../etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%252e%252e%252f%252e%252e%252fetc%252fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~48000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:17:37.000 UTC

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
